name: Slender Man: Stands (Free)
description:
This is Slender Man: Stands! (Free version with ads)

This is a brand new Slender Man game that will scare all the fans out there.
It almost feels as if you really walking in the fog and being hunted by Slender.
The atmosphere is scary.

There are two large levels to play on:
(Field) and (Village)

If you like this game, give it a high rating, thanks!

The Android version of this app is called Slender Man: Rise Again.

Enjoy!
